mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (genre_code, book_code, book_number, book_title, author, press, publishing_date, product.intro_book, img, img_size, grade_code, original_price, sale_price, email, availability, branch_code) VALUES (#{genre_code}, #{book_code}, #{book_number}, #{book_title}, #{author}, #{press}, #{publishing_date}, #{product.intro_book}, #{img}, #{img_size}, #{grade_code}, #{original_price}, #{sale_price}, #{email}, '2', #{branch_code})
mapper.select: SELECT genre_code, book_code, book_number, book_title, author, press, publishing_date, intro_book, img, img_size, grade_code, original_price, sale_price, email, availability, branch_code FROM product ORDER BY registration_date DESC
